@dataclass
class KeyOptions(dataclasses_json.api.DataClassJsonMixin): 
52@dataclass
53class KeyOptions(DataClassJsonMixin):
54    """
55    Key Options
56    """
57
58    comment: Optional[str] = ""
59    expiration_date: Optional[str] = field(
60        default="", metadata=dataclass_config(exclude=lambda f: f == "")
61    )
62    time_to_live_in_seconds: Optional[int] = field(
63        default=-1, metadata=dataclass_config(exclude=lambda f: f == -1)
64    )
65    scopes: List[str] = field(default_factory=list)
66    tags: Optional[List[str]] = field(
67        default=None, metadata=dataclass_config(exclude=lambda f: f is None)
68    )
69
70    def __getitem__(self, key):
71        _dict = self.to_dict()
72        if _dict["scopes"] is not None:
73            _dict["scopes"] = [str(scopes) for scopes in _dict["scopes"]]
74        if _dict["tags"] is not None:
75            _dict["tags"] = [str(tags) for tags in _dict["tags"]]
76        return _dict[key]
77
78    def __setitem__(self, key, val):
79        self.__dict__[key] = val
80
81    def __str__(self) -> str:
82        return self.to_json(indent=4)

@dataclass
class KeyResponse(deepgram.clients.manage.v1.response.BaseResponse): 
257@dataclass
258class KeyResponse(BaseResponse):
259    """
260    Key Response object
261    """
262
263    api_key: Key
264    member: Member
265
266    def __getitem__(self, key):
267        _dict = self.to_dict()
268        if "api_key" in _dict:
269            _dict["api_key"] = Key.from_dict(_dict["api_key"])
270        if "member" in _dict:
271            _dict["member"] = Member.from_dict(_dict["member"])
272        return _dict[key]

class ManageClient(deepgram.clients.abstract_sync_client.AbstractSyncRestClient): 
  46class ManageClient(
  47    AbstractSyncRestClient
  48):  # pylint: disable=too-many-public-methods,too-many-lines
  49    """
  50    A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.
  51
  52    This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:
  53    - Retrieving project details
  54    - Updating project settings
  55    - Managing project members and scopes
  56    - Handling project invitations
  57    - Monitoring project usage and balances
  58
  59    Args:
  60        config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.
  61    """
  62
  63    _logger: verboselogs.VerboseLogger
  64    _config: DeepgramClientOptions
  65    _endpoint: str
  66
  67    def __init__(self, config: DeepgramClientOptions):
  68        self._logger = verboselogs.VerboseLogger(__name__)
  69        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
  70        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
  71
  72        self._config = config
  73        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
  74        super().__init__(config)
  75
  76    # projects
  77    def list_projects(
  78        self,
  79        timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None,
  80        addons: Optional[Dict] = None,
  81        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
  82        **kwargs,
  83    ) -> ProjectsResponse:
  84        """
  85        List all projects for the current user.
  86        """
  87        return self.get_projects(
  88            timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
  89        )
  90
  91    def get_projects(
  92        self,
  93        timeout: Optional[httpx.Timeout] = None,
  94        addons: Optional[Dict] = None,
  95        headers: Optional[Dict] = None,
  96        **kwargs,
  97    ) -> ProjectsResponse:
  98        """
  99        Gets a list of projects for the authenticated user.
 100
 101        Reference:
 102        https://developers.deepgram.com/reference/get-projects
 103        """
 104        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_projects ENTER")
 105        url = f"{self._config.url}/{self._endpoint}"
 106        self._logger.info("url: %s", url)
 107        self._logger.info("addons: %s", addons)
 108        self._logger.info("headers: %s", headers)
 109        result = self.get(
 110            url, timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
 111        )
 112        self._logger.info("json: %s", result)
 113        res = ProjectsResponse.from_json(result)
 114        self._logger.verbose("result: %s", res)
 115        self._logger.notice("get_projects succeeded")
 116        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_projects LEAVE")
 117        return res

 395            timeout (Optional[httpx.Timeout]): The timeout setting for the request.
 396            addons (Optional[Dict]): Additional options for the request.
 397            headers (Optional[Dict]): Headers to include in the request.
 398            **kwargs: Additional keyword arguments.
 399
 400        Returns:
 401            ModelsResponse: A response object containing the model details.
 402        """
 403        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_models ENTER")
 404
 405        if options is None:
 406            options = ModelOptions()
 407
 408        url = f"{self._config.url}/v1/models"
 409        self._logger.info("url: %s", url)
 410        if isinstance(options, ModelOptions):
 411            self._logger.info("ModelOptions switching class -> dict")
 412            options = options.to_dict()
 413        self._logger.info("options: %s", options)
 414        self._logger.info("addons: %s", addons)
 415        self._logger.info("headers: %s", headers)
 416        result = self.get(
 417            url, json=options, timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
 418        )
 419        self._logger.info("json: %s", result)
 420        res = ModelsResponse.from_json(result)
 421        self._logger.verbose("result: %s", res)
 422        self._logger.notice("get_models succeeded")
 423        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_models LEAVE")
 424        return res

A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.

This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:

  • Retrieving project details
  • Updating project settings
  • Managing project members and scopes
  • Handling project invitations
  • Monitoring project usage and balances

Args: config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.

ManageClient(config: deepgram.options.DeepgramClientOptions)

68        self._logger = verboselogs.VerboseLogger(__name__)
69        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
70        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
71
72        self._config = config
73        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
74        super().__init__(config)

class AsyncManageClient(deepgram.clients.abstract_async_client.AbstractAsyncRestClient): 
  46class AsyncManageClient(
  47    AbstractAsyncRestClient
  48):  # pylint: disable=too-many-public-methods,too-many-lines
  49    """
  50    A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.
  51
  52    This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:
  53    - Retrieving project details
  54    - Updating project settings
  55    - Managing project members and scopes
  56    - Handling project invitations
  57    - Monitoring project usage and balances
  58
  59    Args:
  60        config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.
  61    """
  62
  63    _logger: verboselogs.VerboseLogger
  64    _config: DeepgramClientOptions
  65    _endpoint: str
  66
  67    def __init__(self, config: DeepgramClientOptions):
  68        self._logger = verboselogs.VerboseLogger(__name__)
  69        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
  70        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
  71        self._config = config
  72        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
  73        super().__init__(config)

 440            addons (Optional[Dict]): Additional options for the request.
 441            headers (Optional[Dict]): Headers to include in the request.
 442            **kwargs: Additional keyword arguments.
 443
 444        Returns:
 445            ModelResponse: A response object containing the model details.
 446        """
 447        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_model ENTER")
 448        url = f"{self._config.url}/v1/models/{model_id}"
 449        self._logger.info("url: %s", url)
 450        self._logger.info("model_id: %s", model_id)
 451        self._logger.info("addons: %s", addons)
 452        self._logger.info("headers: %s", headers)
 453        result = await self.get(
 454            url, timeout=timeout, addons=addons, headers=headers, **kwargs
 455        )
 456        self._logger.info("result: %s", result)
 457        res = ModelResponse.from_json(result)
 458        self._logger.verbose("result: %s", res)
 459        self._logger.notice("get_model succeeded")
 460        self._logger.debug("ManageClient.get_model LEAVE")
 461        return res

A client for managing Deepgram projects and associated resources via the Deepgram API.

This class provides methods for performing various operations on Deepgram projects, including:

  • Retrieving project details
  • Updating project settings
  • Managing project members and scopes
  • Handling project invitations
  • Monitoring project usage and balances

Args: config (DeepgramClientOptions): all the options for the client.

AsyncManageClient(config: deepgram.options.DeepgramClientOptions)

68        self._logger = verboselogs.VerboseLogger(__name__)
69        self._logger.addHandler(logging.StreamHandler())
70        self._logger.setLevel(config.verbose)
71        self._config = config
72        self._endpoint = "v1/projects"
73        super().__init__(config)
